history.proof: intros A l l' x H. apply cons_is_permutation with (l' := l'). - shelve. - shelve.

ctx: intros A l l' x H.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set l, l' : list A x : A H : insertion A x l l' Unable to unify "insertion A x l l'" with "is_permutation A l l'".

ctx: intros A l l' x H.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set l, l' : list A x : A H : insertion A x l l' Unable to unify "insertion ?M1423 ?M1424 ?M1425 (?M1424 :: ?M1425)" with "is_permutation A l l'".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> is_permutation A (x :: l) l'

Premises:
insertion : forall A : Set, A -> list A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
is_permutation : forall A : Set, list A -> list A -> Prop
cons_is_permutation : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A), is_permutation A l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> is_permutation A (x :: l) l''
is_permutation_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall l l' : list A, is_permutation A l l' -> P l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> P (x :: l) l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, is_permutation A l l0 -> P l l0
is_permutation_sind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall l l' : list A, is_permutation A l l' -> P l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> P (x :: l) l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, is_permutation A l l0 -> P l l0
insertion_in : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> In x l'
tail_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> insertion A x (y :: l) (y :: l')
is_set_insertion : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> is_set A l' -> is_set A l
is_set_insertion_in : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> is_set A l' -> ~ In x l
insertion_inclusion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> forall y : A, In y l -> In y l'
in_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l' : list A, insertion A x l' l
in_insertion_inv : forall (A : Set) (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A y l l' -> In x l' -> x = y \/ In x l
insertion_sind : forall (A : Set) (P : A -> list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x l (x :: l)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> P x l l' -> P x (y :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (y : A) (l l0 : list A), insertion A y l l0 -> P y l l0
insertion_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : A -> list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x l (x :: l)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> P x l l' -> P x (y :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (y : A) (l l0 : list A), insertion A y l l0 -> P y l l0
insertion_is_set : forall (A : Set) (l : list A), is_set A l -> forall x : A, ~ In x l -> forall l' : list A, insertion A x l l' -> is_set A l'
is_set_eq_impl_permutation : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A), (forall x : A, In x l <-> In x l') -> is_set A l -> is_set A l' -> is_permutation A l l'
Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation l l' -> P l l' -> Permutation l' l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, Permutation l l0 -> P l l0
Permutation_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation l l' -> P l l' -> Permutation l' l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, Permutation l l0 -> P l l0
perm_skip : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> Permutation (x :: l) (x :: l')
Add_cons : forall (A : Type) (a x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l')
Inductive Permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := perm_nil : Permutation nil nil | perm_skip : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> Permutation (x :: l) (x :: l') | perm_swap : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Permutation (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l) | perm_trans : forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation l l' -> Permutation l' l'' -> Permutation l l'' Arguments Permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments perm_nil _%type_scope Arguments perm_skip [A]%type_scope _ [l l']%list_scope Arguments perm_swap [A]%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments perm_trans [A]%type_scope [l l' l'']%list_scope
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Add_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Add_in : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> forall x : A, In x l' < -> In x (a :: l)
Permutation_Add : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Permutation (a :: l) l'
head_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l : list A), insertion A x l (x :: l)
Permutation_sym : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> Permutation l' l
Forall2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
Forall2_ind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
Inductive Add (A : Type) (a : A) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Add_head : forall l : list A, Add a l (a :: l) | Add_cons : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l') Arguments Add [A]%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Add_head [A]%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Add_cons [A]%type_scope [a] _ [l l']%list_scope
Forall2_cons : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l')
Add_split : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ l2 /\ l' = l1 ++ a :: l2
Permutation_nil_app_cons : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (x : A), ~ Permutation nil (l ++ x :: l')
cons_is_set : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l : list A), is_set A l -> ~ In x l -> is_set A (x :: l)
Permutation_app : forall (A : Type) (l m l' m' : list A), Permutation l l' -> Permutation m m' -> Permutation (l ++ m) (l' ++ m')
is_permutation_refl : forall (A : Set) (l : list A), is_permutation A l l
insertion_snoc : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (xs : list A), insertion A x xs (xs ++ x :: nil)
Permutation_add_inside : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' tl tl' : list A), Permutation l l' -> Permutation tl tl' -> Permutation (l ++ a :: tl) (l' ++ a :: tl')
exists_last : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l <> nil -> {l' : list A & {a : A | l = l' ++ a :: nil}}
is_set_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), is_set A l -> P l -> ~ In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, is_set A l -> P l
is_set_sind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), is_set A l -> P l -> ~ In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, is_set A l -> P l
Inductive Forall2 (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) : list A -> list B -> Prop := Forall2_nil : Forall2 R nil nil | Forall2_cons : forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l') Arguments Forall2 [A B]%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Forall2_nil [A B]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall2_cons [A B]%type_scope [R]%function_scope _ _ [l l']%list_scope

```  
intros A l l' x H.
apply cons_is_permutation with (l' := l').
apply H.
apply head_insertion.
Qed.
```
